name: fly to the hope
description:
complete your airplane to  fly this    terrible  land  for finding a place that's  not been infested. Use your machete and shotgun to overcome bandits and monsters.Pass deadly traps.Discover ruined cities forgotten mines

Controls 

U opens menu 

j  hit machete

H to interact speaking, entering doors

K fire

L jump

w a s d or  arrow keys to move

shift tumble

O reload

P heal
